sentences.sContent: Management have agreed to extend the deadline.
sentences.sCn: 管理层已同意延长最后期限。

sentences.sContent: ...Their goal is to convince lawmakers to extend unemployment benefits...
...But Pennsylvania State Representative Scott Petri says governments simply do not have enough money to extend unemployment insurance...
...the impact will extend far beyond agriculture-locking up property rights in an array of important areas...
...The central issue in the case is whether patent rights to living things extend to the progeny of those things...
...Monsanto argues that its patents extend to later generations...

synos.tran: 延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价

words.tran: 延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
可延长的；可展开的；可扩张的
延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机

trans.tranOther: to continue for a longer period of time, or to make something last longer
